# Glyph of Warding, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 12]]

**Casting Time:** 10 minutes

**Components:** V, S, M (powdered diamond worth 200 gp)

**Range:** Touch

**Target or Area:** Object touched or up to 5 sq. ft./level

**Duration:** Permanent until discharged (D)

**Saving Throw:** See text

**Spell Resistance:** No (object) and yes; see text

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 291

This spell functions like *[[Glyph of Warding (Spell)|glyph of warding]]**,* except that a *greater blast glyph* deals up to 10d8 points of damage, and a *greater spell glyph* can store a spell of 6th level or lower.

*[[Read Magic (Spell)|Read magic]]* allows you to identify a *greater glyph of warding* with a DC 16 [[Spellcraft (Skill)|Spellcraft]] check.

*Material Component*: You trace the glyph with incense, which must first be sprinkled with powdered diamond worth at least 400 gp.
